page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN KINGS NORTON
page.content: On the 30th of April we went out to find information on local industry,here is some.GPS Jewellery make wedding rings which cost 49pounds each.Engage- ment rings cost 45pounds and last of all signet rings,the 9 carat gold ones cost 19pound and the 18 carat gold cost 45 pounds,and about 2/10 are exported and 8/10 stay in England.They make pearls and the main pearl is a lotus pearl.The price of pearl and rings accord to the weight of them. We visited a factory called Down and Francis. At this factory they make steel structures,fabrications and plant They manufacture structures for road sites in a number of styles;gantry butterfly or standard. We came to lots of other works.These are some of them: Steel-stockholders,James Car Deliveries Down and Francis Ltd and Carnival Designs.By Class 3 Broadmeadow J Sch
